Task: Multi-Label Binary Classification for Medical Texts
Description: Given the following medical report text, determine a multi-label binary classification for lesions with physical size greater than 10 mm. Output a list of 5 booleans, where each position indicates whether lesion 1, 2, 3, 4, or 5 is present and meets the size criteria.

reasoning.description: The thought process leading to the final answer.

lesion_1.description: True if the size is mentioned for the first RECIST target lesion and it is larger than 10 mm, false otherwise.

lesion_2.description: True if the size is mentioned for the second RECIST target lesion and it is larger than 10 mm, false otherwise.

lesion_3.description: True if the size is mentioned for the third RECIST target lesion and it is larger than 10 mm, false otherwise.

lesion_4.description: True if the size is mentioned for the fourth RECIST target lesion and it is larger than 10 mm, false otherwise.

lesion_5.description: True if the size is mentioned for the fifth RECIST target lesion and it is larger than 10 mm, false otherwise.
